data.weather: Dry overnight Sunday but with sharp frost at dawn on Monday - hence delayed confirmation of going. Monday: dry with sunny spells, +9C
data.other: There are long term roadworks on A47 on the western side of King's Lynn and also traffic lights on the main road between King's Lynn and Fakenham at Hillington. Please give yourself sufficient travel time. We look forward to seeing you on the 4th Dec, and questions please give me a call on 07767 802206. David
